    com.jme.export.Savable
    public class InstancedDirectionalShadowFilter
extends DirectionalLightShadowFilterVR
    An instanced version of the directional light shadow filter dedi.
    Author:
    reden - phr00t - https://github.com/phr00t, Julien Seinturier - COMEX SA - http://www.seinturier.fr

    • Constructor Detail

      • InstancedDirectionalShadowFilter

        public InstancedDirectionalShadowFilter​(com.jme.app.Application application,
                                        com.jme.renderer.Camera camera,
                                        int shadowMapSize,
                                        int nbSplits,
                                        boolean instancedRendering,
                                        com.jme.renderer.Camera rightCamera)
        Create a new instanced version of the directional light shadow filter.
        Parameters:
        application - the application that this filter is attached to.
        camera -
        shadowMapSize - the size of the rendered shadowmaps (512, 1024, 2048, etc...)
        nbSplits - the number of shadow maps rendered (the more shadow maps the more quality, the less fps).
        instancedRendering - true if this filter has to use instance rendering and false otherwise.
        rightCamera - the camera used as right eye in stereo rendering mode.
